original_title: Miss Lillian Shaffer and Her Dancing Horse
overview: This film appears to have been taken in a fairgrounds or a similar cleared area. A woman mounted on her horse is seen guiding it through a number of difficult tricks, such as various paces, crossing one foot in front of another, side stepping, and "dancing." the film ends while the horse is executing a bow.
title: Miss Lillian Shaffer and Her Dancing Horse
